profile:
Professional residential and commercial design services

With over 25+ years experience in the Home Staging business we are now offering Commercial Design to our business in the Durham region.  
We offer in home or on site consultations at your convenience.

Dedicated to designing your ideal area with customer service, consumer appeal, and productivity all in mind.

Troy has offered home owners quality renovations since 1987 and is now offering designs and staging opportunities to those leading into the Commercial Industry, whether it be a new office or an entire building. 

We offer interior and exterior renovation services for Residential as well as Commercial industry, in every budget. If you are looking at one room, one office, or the entire property, we can assist you along the way.  Our finishing work will surpass your expectations every time. 

This Spring let us Design and Construct your indoor or outdoor living space. Whether it be a screened porch, new deck or an interlocking patio we are here to work with you every step of the way.  

Do you have plans to renovate your Kitchen or Bathroom this winter?  Let us work with you to come up with a design that suits your needs and within your budget.  This is a great time of the year to do these larger projects because of discounts on products and services are available.

Do you have a flooring project you want us to look at?  We intall Hardwood, Laminate, Engineered and Ceramic Tile.  Let us shop our suppliers to get you the best deal.

At TROY HULL HOME IMPROVEMENTS (residential), we recognize the need for prompt and professional workmanship.  We will maintain a tidy and organized work site and work with your schedule to ensure a good working relationship from start to finish.

TROY HULL HOME IMPROVEMENTS (residential), will provide you with a free written quote, a start date, an estimated completion date and satisfaction guaranteed.

Call or email us at any time

Troy Hull Home
